poem:
**Discord at the White**

The leaders met beneath the watchful glare,  
Of history's gaze, where whispers fill the air.  
Their words, once bold, now fractured, left unspoke,  
As tempests rise in thunderous tone they broke.  
Two ships adrift on seas of widening rift,  
Their bonds now tested by a world adrift.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Federal workers might get email requiring response after Trump and Musk praise efforts to investigate workforce – live 6.42pm GMT Trump-Zelenskyy press conference cancelled with Zelenskyy set to leave early Following furiously heated talks earlier, during which Donald Trump shouted at the Ukrainian president, the joint press conference has been canceled, the White House said. A White House source confirmed to Reuters that Volodymyr Zelenskyy is leaving the White House early. Trump posted on Truth". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Federal workers might get email requiring response after Trump and Musk praise efforts to investigate workforce – live 6.42pm GMT Trump-Zelenskyy press conference cancelled with Zelenskyy set to leave early Following furiously heated talks earlier, during which Donald Trump shouted at the Ukrainian president, the joint press conference has been canceled, the White House said. A White House source confirmed to Reuters that Volodymyr Zelenskyy is leaving the White House early. Trump posted on Truth
